description: Brock's here to help bring Dawson a little further across the line tonight, and it doesn't take long before the sparks fly, as Brock is all over Dawson's dick, working it up with his mouth to a nice, full hard on.Dawson just kicks back and enjoys the ride as he lets Brock work his magic.  Then Dawson does the unthinkable, throwing Brock back on the bed and jerking his hard dick fast and rough - he seems to enjoy finally getting the chance to play with another guy's cock. It makes you wonder just how long he's thought about it.Our buddy Brock has been here enough to know that sometimes you have to take the other guy by the hand and show him the ropes. Things don't go to the full next level here between Brock and Dawson, but it opens up plenty of windows. I think after he catches his breath, Dawson will be back for the full monty!
title: Brock & Dawson, Scene #01
